sn14.34:1.2: “Pathavidhatu ce hidam, bhikkhave, ekantadukkha abhavissa dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, nayidam satta pathavidhatuya sarajjeyyum.
sn14.34:1.3: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavidhatu sukha sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, tasma satta pathavidhatuya sarajjanti.
sn14.34:2.3: vayodhatu ce hidam, bhikkhave, ekantadukkha abhavissa dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, nayidam satta vayodhatuya sarajjeyyum.
sn14.34:2.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vayodhatu sukha sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, tasma satta vayodhatuya sarajjanti.
sn14.34:3.1: Pathavidhatu ce hidam, bhikkhave, ekantasukha abhavissa sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, nayidam satta pathavidhatuya nibbindeyyum.
sn14.34:3.2: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, pathavidhatu dukkha dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, tasma satta pathavidhatuya nibbindanti.
sn14.34:4.3: vayodhatu ce hidam, bhikkhave, ekantasukha abhavissa sukhanupatita sukhavakkanta anavakkanta dukkhena, nayidam satta vayodhatuya nibbindeyyum.
sn14.34:4.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vayodhatu dukkha dukkhanupatita dukkhavakkanta anavakkanta sukhena, tasma satta vayodhatuya nibbindanti”ti.
